subject: PE Today: The Next Cindy Sheehan?
body:
CBSNews.com



 










Adam 
      Kokesh: The New Cindy 
      Sheehan?With Cindy 
      Sheehan having retired from the anti-war movement, is it too soon 
      to wonder if she's already getting a replacement? Enter Marine Sgt. Adam Kokesh, a photogenic Iraq 
      veteran who has become something of an inside-the-beltway provacatuer, 
      stirring up trouble around Washington with stunts like roaming Washington 
      in camouflage as if he was on patrol.[+ Read More]


Killer 
      Bee ... Winners
It’s a 
      proven scientific fact: Everybody remembers the words they got 
      wrong in their childhood spelling bees.  Why then, does the media have such amnesia when it comes to spelling bee winners and how 
      painful it is to watch them get interviewed? These annual interviews are at 
      times amusing, at times uncomfortable, and at times bordering on a bizarre 
      instance of picking on the smart kid.[+ Read More]


Monster 
      Hog: Media Myth?
By now, you've surely heard the tale of the 11-year-old boy, the 
      three-hour chase, and the biggest hog you ever saw. To try to get to the 
      bottom of this pressing issue, Public 
      Eye reached out to CBSNews.com senior designer James 
      Morris to see if there's something 
      fishy about the 1,500 pound hog.[+ Read More]
